content.question: According to Adam Smith, the “invisible hand” would

choices.label: provide checks and balances among the branches of government
convince devout men and women of the value of religious toleration
reconcile selfish individual interests with general economic benefits
guide absolute monarchs to embrace liberal reforms
cause population to exceed available food supplies

content.answer: reconcile selfish individual interests with general economic benefits

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
